title: Stream Now: Good Omens - Season 1 | New Amazon Original 2019
author: Amazon Prime Video India
comment: I’ve just watched all through it, and boy is it beautiful
Finally a series by Terry Pratchett
Jesuss  vai voltar so esqueceram de citar nosso criador qie e maior que tudo isso!
description:
One of the most awaited fantasy Amazon Original series Good Omens - Season 1 is streaming now, only on Amazon Prime Video. 
The original is directed by Douglas Mackinnon, written by Neil Gaiman based on Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch (1990), a World Fantasy, novel written as a collaboration between the English authors Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman. 

Credits : 
Written by - Neil Gaiman
Directed by -  Douglas Mackinnon
Music by - David Arnold

Star Cast :
David Tennant, Michael Sheen, Anna Maxwell Martin
Jon Hamm, Josie Lawrence, Adria Arjona, Michael McKean
Jack Whitehall, Miranda Richardson, Nick Offerman
